飽人不知餓人飢.pinyin: bao3 ren2 bu4 zhi1 e4 ren2 ji1
飽人不知餓人飢.definition: The well-fed cannot know how the starving suffer (idiom).

飽以老拳.definition: to thump repeatedly with one's fist

飽受.definition: to endure; to suffer; to be subjected to

飽含.definition: to be full of (emotion); to brim with (love, tears etc)

飽嘗.definition: to enjoy fully; to experience to the full over a long period

飽暖思淫欲，飢寒起盜心.pinyin: bao3 nuan3 si1 yin2 yu4 , ji1 han2 qi3 dao4 xin1
飽暖思淫欲，飢寒起盜心.definition: lechery springs from warmth and nourishment, kleptomania springs from hunger and cold (idiom)

飽漢不知餓漢飢.pinyin: bao3 han4 bu4 zhi1 e4 han4 ji1
飽漢不知餓漢飢.definition: The well-fed cannot know how the starving suffer (idiom).

飽私囊.definition: to stuff one's pockets; to enrich oneself dishonestly

飽經風霜.definition: weather-beaten; having experienced the hardships of life

飽綻.definition: to swell to bursting (after having eaten too much)

飽覽.definition: to look intensively; to feast one's eyes on

飽食終日.definition: to spend the whole day eating (i.e. not doing any work)

飽食終日，無所用心.pinyin: bao3 shi2 zhong1 ri4 , wu2 suo3 yong4 xin1
飽食終日，無所用心.definition: to eat three square meals a day and do no work (idiom); to be sated with food and remain idle

飽餐一頓.definition: to eat one's fill; to be full

飽餐戰飯.definition: to fill one's belly before the battle (idiom)
